name: Salt Lake 2002
description: Salt Lake 2002 features six official events, authentic Olympic environments, single- and multiplayer modes, detailed graphics, and TV-style presentation. The six official events are Men's Alpine Skiing Downhill, Ladies' Alpine Skiing Slalom, Men's Two-Man Bobsleigh, Women's Freestyle Skiing Aerials, Men's Ski Jumping K120 Individual, and Men's Snowboard Parallel Giant Slalom. The game includes a variety of single- and multiplayer game modes, including Olympic, classic, tournament, and freeform. Every event and its environment has been authentically modeled and reproduced. The developers created environments using satellite imaging technology, with terrain accurate to 2 feet in height. The game utilizes the latest motion capture technology and real-time physics for realistic character movement.
